Friends and More Art Exhibition
1  January,  2022
The exhibition, held at M7 Building, was organized by Al-Hosh Gallery and supported by Msheireb. It was held on the sidelines of the Qatar Creates events. We were honored by the presence of H.E. Sheikha Al-Mayasah bint Hamad Al-Thani, whose visit served as support for the Best Buddies participants
